QuestData.Title: And Justice for Thrall
QuestData.Description: The time has come, commander. You've dealt with all of the Warsong's allies and holdings.$B$BOur troops are massing at the gates of Grommashar. The rangari have reliable intel that Garrosh is holed up inside the Warsong fortress.$B$BAll of our efforts have led to this moment. Let's take out Garrosh.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Vindicator Yrel at the Gates of Grommashar and lead the assault on the Warsong.
QuestData.RewardText: It's over. The Warsong are broken. Garrosh Hellscream is finally dead.$B$BSomehow, I sense it's only a matter of time before Grommash seeks vengeance.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Vindicator Yrel at the Gates of Grommashar
